author: ACC Digital Network
title: Ven-Allen Lubin 2024-25 Regular Season Highlights | North Carolina Forward
text:
Ven-Allen Lubin 2024-25 Regular Season Highlights | North Carolina Forward
North Carolina forward Ven-Allen Lubin turned out to be a big get out of the transfer portal for the Tar Heels during the 2024-25. Lubin finished the season averaging 8.6 points per game, a team-high 5.6 rebounds and 0.9 blocks while shooting 67.7% from the floor. Lubin emerged as the go-to guy on the inside for Carolina as the season progressed, as the team had to replace the huge production that was lost with the departure of Armando Bacot. Enjoy this look at the best plays Ven-Allen Lubin made for the Tar Heels brought to you by the ACC Digital...
Read more at www.youtube.com
